title: hidden module when debug with ollydbg 2.01 with size?
content:
i try reversing program with ollydbg2.01, but i Noticed strange thing with ollydbg when try debug program in log file i have 
76FC0000 Module (anonymous)
and when press 
alt+E
i have size ??? and type 
hidden
.

comments.text: Can you share the .exe with us?
exe is just the test.exe that come with ollydbg2.01

I can't reproduce what you're seeing with the 
test.exe
that comes with OllyDbg 2.01. Are you using any OllyDbg plugins, and do you have any special security software installed?
first i have ollyext with olly and i thought problem from ollyext so i remove it but even without plugin i still see this problem, i'm not have any special security software installed.
